segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing, and the kids are sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging off that stool, and the girl is just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a comedy sketch, but it’s actually happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the outside looks so calm and tidy, while inside it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast is just too funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but I can’t stop smiling at the absurdity of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
